entry.title: Current Conditions: 18.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 16.
